• • • • •
We teased you yesterday, but no more monkeying around…here’s the recipe for Monkey Punch!

This tasty cocktail recipe has been created by Erik Lorincz from Kwānt, No.47 in The World’s 50 Best Bars 2019, with Monkey Shoulder whisky. Will you be giving it a try?

𝐈𝐧𝐠𝐫𝐞𝐝𝐢𝐞𝐧𝐭𝐬
25ml Monkey Shoulder
25ml Calvados
10ml Mezcal
10ml oloroso sherry
50ml oat milk
5g zatar
15g demerara sugar 
Garnished with floregano •
Video by @50bestbars
#tw50bc #theworlds50bestcocktails
#Worlds50BestBars #50BestBars #Cocktail #Bar #London #Recipe #CocktailRecipe #Bartender #UK #whisky @monkeyshoulder @kwantlondon @eriklorincz

node.text:
𝑻𝒉𝒂𝒏𝒌𝒔 𝒕𝒐 🍸 @_shuichi.akai_ 

Violet Fizz 🌺 - Violet liqueur is a difficult ingredient... Difficult because the taste is very specific and only a few people seem to like it. Difficult, because if you try to add it to any drink as some kind of interesting background flavour it either gets lost or overpowers the other ingredients. And at last difficult, because of the colour, which looks awful if you add it to for example an orange colored drink. 

To be honest its not really my favorite too... But on the other hand a good made Aviation is absolutely delicious 👌
The Violet Fizz is basically a Tom Collins with violet liqueur, which can taste delicious if you find the right gin to pair it with. Maybe adding spices and herbs like I did with some sage leaves would give the Violet Fizz a whole new flavor profile 🤔 

60 ml gin
20 ml @thebittertruthcompany violet liqueur
30 ml fresh lemon juice
10 ml sugar syrup 2:1
Stir with a few sage leaves
Top with soda 

For garnish I used a gypsophila sprig and a few sage leaves🌿 Cheers!

node.text:
𝑻𝒉𝒂𝒏𝒌𝒔 𝒕𝒐 🍸 @servedbysoberon 

VINTAGE NEGRONI
- 30ml/1oz Gordon's Gin
- 30ml/1oz Campari
- 30ml/1oz Martini & Rossi Sweet Vermouth
- - - - -
HOW: Stir / Strain over ice / Express and garnish with orange twist.
- - - - -
So, most of you know by now that I have been collecting vintage spirits for a while now.☺️ And while I've had plans for over a year and a half to start making cocktails with most of them, I now finally started! 🍸 So welcome to this part of my journey, where I'm whipping up drinks with spirits that breathe history 🥃.
.
And what better way to start than with a classic Negroni.🇮🇹 Gordon's Gin from back when it was distilled in London (at higher proof 🔥), Campari from before it was colored artificially, and of course a vintage bottling of Martini & Rossi's Sweet Vermouth.🔴 A rich, delicate, and complex blast from the past!
.
Drinkstagram ❤️ what other old-school drinks would you like to see me make and share?🍹 I can't wait to make these Vintage cocktails a regular feature here on SBS! 

𝑻𝒆𝒍𝒍 𝒖𝒔 𝒘𝒉𝒂𝒕 𝒚𝒐𝒖 𝒕𝒉𝒊𝒏𝒌 𝒊𝒏 𝒕𝒉𝒆 𝒄𝒐𝒎𝒎𝒆𝒏𝒕𝒔 ⬇️

node.text:
𝑻𝒉𝒂𝒏𝒌𝒔 𝒕𝒐 🍸 @paradiso_lab 

El mundo de la mixología es fascinante, y gracias a la imaginación y el trabajo duro se pueden crear fantásticos cócteles como este llamado The Cloud con, @ketelone Vodka infusionado con Hibiscus, mezcal, @amaromontenegro_ww, dry @mancinovermouth, piparras, Xilitol cordial, @Perrier y @vom_edible_cloud de café. Que os parece? Os leemos! ☁️⁣⁣
----⁣⁣
The mixology world is fascinating, and thanks to the imagination and hard work you can create fantastic cocktails like this one called The Cloud with Hibiscus-infused Vodka, mezcal, Montenegro amaro, Dry Mancino Vermouth, piparras, Xylitol cordial, Perrier, and Coffee cloud. What do you think? We read you! ☁️

node.text:
𝑻𝒉𝒂𝒏𝒌𝒔 𝒕𝒐 🍸 @no23cocktails 

-𝗖𝗛𝗘𝗥𝗥𝗬 𝗡𝗘𝗚𝗥𝗢𝗡𝗜-🍒 

***TR/EN (Recipe included)*** 

🥃Negroni haftası geldi. 13 Eylül’de başlayan Negroni haftası 19 Eylül’e kadar devam edecek. Daha önceki gönderilerimde klasik Negroni tarifini paylaştığım için, Negroni haftasına özel kiraz🍒 aromalı bir Negroni varyasyonu paylaşmak istedim. Harika bir Negroni haftası olsun, kokteyli beğendiyseniz kaydetmeyi unutmayın. Tarif için buyurunuz.! 

Malzemeler:
🔹️4 cl Cin
🔹️3 cl Martini Bianco Vermut
🔹️1,5 cl Luxardo Maraschino (Kiraz aromalı likör)
🔹️2 damla Kiraz Bitteri 

Tarifi:
Tüm malzemeleri buzla doldurulmuş bir karıştırma kabına ekleyin ve soğuyana kadar iyice karıştırın. Büyük şeffaf buz küpü ile dolu bir bardağa süzün. Kiraz ile süsleyebilirsiniz🍒.
________________________________ 

-𝗖𝗛𝗘𝗥𝗥𝗬 𝗡𝗘𝗚𝗥𝗢𝗡𝗜-🍒 

🥃Negroni week is here.! Negroni week, which started on September 13, will continue until September 19. Since I shared the classic Negroni recipe in my previous posts, I wanted to share a cherry🍒 flavored Negroni variation special for Negroni week. Have a wonderful Negroni week and don't forget to save it if you like it. Here is the recipe.! 

Ingredients:
🔹️4 cl Gin
🔹️3 cl Martini Bianco Vermouth
🔹️1,5 cl Luxardo Maraschino Liqueur
🔹️2 dashes Cherry Bitters 

Recipe:
Add all of the ingredients to a mixing glass filled with ice, and stir until well-chilled. Strain into a rocks glass filled with large clear ice cube. Garnish with a cherry🍒.

🍹@no23cocktails
📸@ozgurygn

node.text:
𝑻𝒉𝒂𝒏𝒌𝒔 𝒕𝒐 🍸 @niclimdrinks 

My first bluish cocktail and one of my most beautiful creations yet - the Indigo Lady. It's a supercharged version of the White Lady, with amazing aromatic flavours of the unique indigo syrup from @botanikos.syrups. 

This syrup is not just about the colour. It is an artisanal blend of star anise and butterfly pea flowers. The licorice flavours are subtle but warmly inviting as you continue to sip. I added elderflower liqueur to highlight the bright floral notes of the syrup. Beautiful to look at and delicious to drink, this cocktail is the perfect companion to the start of spring in the Southern Hemisphere. 

Indigo Lady:
45 ml Gin @hendricksgin
15 ml Elderflower Liqueur @marie_brizard_official
22.5 ml Lemon Juice
22.5 ml Indigo Syrup @botanikos.syrups
22.5 ml Egg White
2 Barspoon Blue Curacao @marie_brizard_official

𝑻𝒉𝒂𝒏𝒌𝒔 𝒕𝒐 🍸 @thecocktail.blog 

YELLOW JACKET RIFF
👨‍✈️
Originally having a base of Tequila, I saw it a perfect opportunity to take it in a wee different direction
👨‍✈️
It's no secret, that one of my favorite split endeavors is that of Gin & Mezcal - they compliment each other incredibly well in my book
👨‍✈️
Using another favorite template of mine, today's subtle, potent, sophisticated and fully enjoyable variation of the original, brought me much Joy
👨‍✈️
Would you;
👨‍✈️
GET MY JACKET PLEASE
👨‍✈️
30 ml Dry Gin (@illusionist_gin )
30 ml Mezcal 'Joven'
15 ml Elderflower Liqueur
10 ml Maraschino Amaro
2 Dashes Orange 🍊Bitters
Stir with Passion & Ice
Strain into chilled cocktail glass
Express lemon peel over the drink
Garnish fresh Eucalyptus leaf 🍃
Enjoy
Skål 🥂
⚜️
Find this, and many more, Classic and New Classics, on my website www.thecocktailblog.dk
⚜️

• • • • • •
PUN 

🌴 Tropical “ Jungle Bird “ �
�
🕊 PUN uses simple syrup and cane sugar clusters for a better balance of its aroma and sweetness. Mixing it with Zacapa Rum 23 year, Campari and lime, we create a classic structured spirit with a bitter sweet balance.�
�
🍍 At last, Finalizing our Jungle Bird with filtered and clarified pineapple juice which gives a pure pineapple aroma without the disturbance of its fiber, echoing the tropical jungle touch of aged rum.�
�
�
�
🌴 熱帶 " Jungle Bird " �
�
🕊 用單糖糖水混和蔗糖塊，保有甜度帶出蔗香，混和 Zacapa23y Rum , Campari , Lime，做出經典烈酒苦甜酸的結構平衡。�
�
🍍 再加入除去纖維的澄清鳳梨汁，給予清澈鳳梨果香，與陳年蘭姆酒互相呼應出熱帶叢林樣貌。�
�
�

Zacapa23y / Campari / Clarified Pineapple Juice / Simple Syrup / Sugar Cane�

node.text:
𝑻𝒉𝒂𝒏𝒌𝒔 𝒕𝒐 🍸 @cheerstohappyhour 

(Recipe Included) - 

Negroni Week has got me seeing all manner of bitter sippers from Chilean Negroni’s (as seen on @thehobbydrinkchef) to even a volcano Negroni I spotted on @camparicanada (compliments to @Giacomoloris_).
.
I wanted to create something inspired by the flavours of Japan. @nikkawhiskyusa gin, a little Umeshu and a touch of Umami is something that just needed to happen. In this glass is a lot of the classic flavours of the Negroni, but with noticeable plum up front and a salinity that makes every sip engulf your palate.
.
Drink: Umegroni
1 oz Nikka Coffey Gin
0.5 oz Sweet Vermouth
0.5 oz Choya Umeshu
1 oz Campari
4 drops Umami Bitters
.
(Method)
Stir all ingredients with ice and strain into a rocks glass filled with fresh ice. Garnish: Plum
